name: Alone (itch) (Screen Smith Studios, Journeyman Game Studios)
name_original: Alone (itch) (Screen Smith Studios, Journeyman Game Studios)
description:
Alone

Entry for Ludum Dare 51:  "Every 10 Seconds"

Please Rate Here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/$296818

Note: Only windows and WebGL have been tested and confirmed working. OSX and Linux may not work

Navigate a dangerous forest while searching for shelter and food. Monsters roam freely during the day but sleep at night. You can hide from them during the day and carefully plan for your moves at night, but be careful! As every second passes you get hungrier and hungrier. If your hunger meter reaches zero or or a monster gets you it’s game over. Find the key and use it to escape into the forest vault, where you will be safe. For a little while at least…

Source code here

Controls

- WASD to move
- Mouse to navigate menu
